item.description:
JOIN US for this once-a-year extravaganza with Robyn Vogel of Sacred Tantric Fire, Brynn Bishop of Tantric Intimacy, and Penny Gold of Source School of Tantra Yoga!

**********************************************************************

 

Tantric Celebration:  Connect with Community!

Manifest YOUR Deepest Desires!

 

 

Join us for this powerful event!  Part workshop, part social party, this extraordinary evening will combine enlivening exercises to awaken your senses to pleasure, ignite your passion and super charge your intentions for 2013 with potent Tantric energy magic that will help you manifest your deepest desires and bring you into alignment with your highest and best Self!


Open dancing, mingling, and fun sensate exploration will round out the celebratory evening.

This special event, co-facilitated by Brynn, Robyn and Penny, brings 3 local tantra communities together to create a magical start to 2013.

Come connect with others in your local Tantra community.

***OPTIONAL:  Feel free to bring food to delight the senses; along with materials and textures to share with each other through the evening.

***Please note this workshop is $30 if you pay in advance (PayPal) or $40 at the door.  Space is limited (and we expect this will be a huge celebration!) so please RSVP NOW!

 

Love and blessings always!!!
item.name: New Year's Triple Goddess Tantra Blast-Off!
